sentences.sContent: He eagerly snuffled a mouthful of smoke.
sentences.sContent_eng: He eagerly snuffled a mouthful of smoke.
sentences.sCn: 他急切贪婪地吸了一口烟。

sentences.sContent: She eagerly read every word, and asked me several questions about the people at the Grange.
sentences.sContent_eng: She eagerly read every word, and asked me several questions about the people at the Grange.
sentences.sCn: 她急切地读着每一个字，还问了我几个关于画眉山庄里的人的问题。
